Class InitialAccessPage

java.lang.Object
pages.InitialAccessPage
public class InitialAccessPage extends Object
InitialAccessPage builds and shows the initial access UI used for login, sign-up and password reset flows. The page composes three main panes (login, sign up, reset) inside a centered card and wires handlers to swap between them.

The class depends on a DatabaseHelper instance that is supplied in the constructor for database operations (user lookup, registration, password reset requests, etc.). UI actions will call the database helper and display alerts / inline error messages accordingly.

Usage example: 

     InitialAccessPage page = new InitialAccessPage(databaseHelper);
     page.show(primaryStage);
Since:
1.0

    • InitialAccessPage

      public InitialAccessPage(DatabaseHelper databaseHelper)
      Create an InitialAccessPage backed by the provided DatabaseHelper.

  • Method Details

    • show

      public void show(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Show the initial access window on the given Stage. This builds the UI (background, card layout, login/reset/signup panes) and displays the stage.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the JavaFX Stage to show the UI on

    • buildResetPane

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox buildResetPane(javafx.scene.layout.VBox card)

    • handleSignUp

      public void handleSignUp(javafx.scene.control.TextField usernameField, javafx.scene.control.PasswordField passwordField, javafx.scene.control.TextField inviteCodeField, javafx.scene.control.Label errorLabel, javafx.scene.control.Button signUpBtn, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Handle the sign-up flow: validate input, create a User, register it in the database and navigate to the welcome page on success. The method updates the provided errorLabel with validation or error messages and disables the signUpBtn while performing work.
      Parameters:
      usernameField - the username input field
      passwordField - the password input field
      inviteCodeField - invitation code input field (may be optional)
      errorLabel - label used to display inline error messages
      signUpBtn - the sign-up button (disabled while processing)
      primaryStage - the stage used to show the welcome page on success

    • handleLogin

      public void handleLogin(javafx.scene.control.TextField userNameField, javafx.scene.control.PasswordField passwordField, javafx.scene.control.Label errorLabel, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Handle login attempts. This method checks the username/password with the database helper and will navigate to the welcome page, a role selection page, or a password reset flow depending on the result.
      Parameters:
      userNameField - username input field
      passwordField - password input field
      errorLabel - label to display login errors
      primaryStage - the stage to navigate on successful login
